00026 #include "OgreKeyFrame.h"
00027 
00028 namespace Ogre
00029 {
00030     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00031     KeyFrame::KeyFrame(Real time) : mTime(time)
00032     {
00033         mTranslate = Vector3::ZERO;
00034         mScale.x = mScale.y = mScale.z = 1.0;
00035         mRotate = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00036     }
00037     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00038     KeyFrame::KeyFrame() : mTime(0.0)
00039     {
00040         mTranslate = Vector3::ZERO;
00041         mScale.x = mScale.y = mScale.z = 1.0;
00042         mRotate = Quaternion::IDENTITY;
00043     }
00044     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00045     Real KeyFrame::getTime(void) const
00046     {
00047         return mTime;
00048     }
00049     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00050     void KeyFrame::setTranslate(const Vector3& trans)
00051     {
00052         mTranslate = trans;
00053     }
00054     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00055     Vector3 KeyFrame::getTranslate(void) const
00056     {
00057         return mTranslate;
00058     }
00059     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00060     void KeyFrame::setScale(const Vector3& scale)
00061     {
00062         mScale = scale;
00063     }
00064     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00065     Vector3 KeyFrame::getScale(void) const
00066     {
00067         return mScale;
00068     }
00069     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00070     void KeyFrame::setRotation(const Quaternion& rot)
00071     {
00072         mRotate = rot;
00073     }
00074     //---------------------------------------------------------------------
00075     Quaternion KeyFrame::getRotation(void) const
00076     {
00077         return mRotate;
00078     }
00079 
00080 }
